properties.areaDesc: Pamlico and Pungo Rivers; Neuse and Bay Rivers
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 11 at 3:22AM EST until January 12 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
...STRONG WINDS AND DANGEROUS SEAS TONIGHT INTO EARLY SUNDAY...

.Southerly winds will increase to 15 to 25 knots today, and 20 to
30 knots tonight and early Sunday. A brief period of gale force
wind gusts will be possible across the outer central waters as
winds peak late tonight into Sunday morning. Seas will build to 5
to 9 feet today and peak at 8 to 12 feet late tonight and early
Sunday. Winds will gradually diminish late Sunday and Sunday
night, but elevated seas will linger across the waters into early
next week.

* WHAT...South winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and
rough waters expected.

* WHERE...Pamlico, Pungo, Neuse, and Bay Rivers.

* WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 7 AM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 AM EST SUNDAY
